text: They stumble upon Luder walking fast down the Seine's malecones. Where are you going? In the Plaza de la Concordia. At noon, Louis XVI's head is cut off. But that was two centuries ago! Oh, my God! "Luder says looking at his watch". I see you were a little late. Finished by Luder, 1989
title: Un ligero retraso
author: Julio Ramón Ribeyro
